meanings.definition: An optical instrument with two eyepieces used for viewing objects in three dimensions.
meanings.sent1: I looked through the stereomicroscope and saw the tiny bug in 3D.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use a stereomicroscope to examine small objects more closely.
meanings.sent3: The bug felt like a movie star under the spotlight of the stereomicroscope.
meanings.sent4: With the stereomicroscope, the world of tiny creatures becomes a grand theater.
meanings.sent5: Through the stereomicroscope, the details of the insect's wings popped out like a 3D movie.

meanings.definition: A microscope that provides a three-dimensional view of an object.
meanings.sent1: The stereomicroscope allowed me to see the rock's texture in 3D.
meanings.sent2: In biology class, we used a stereomicroscope to study plant cells.
meanings.sent3: The stereomicroscope made the tiny seed look like a giant boulder.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled as she peered through the stereomicroscope, discovering a new world.
meanings.sent5: Through the stereomicroscope, the leaf's veins seemed like highways on a map.
